## Maintenance Task Description
A clear and concise description of the maintenance task needed.

## Reason for Maintenance
Why is this maintenance needed? What problem does it address?

## Type of Maintenance
- [ ] Code refactoring
- [ ] Dependency updates
- [ ] Performance optimization
- [ ] Documentation updates
- [ ] Code cleanup
- [ ] Security patches
- [ ] Other (please specify)

## Scope of Work
What areas of the codebase will be affected?

## Impact Assessment
- [ ] Low impact (isolated changes)
- [ ] Medium impact (affects multiple files)
- [ ] High impact (affects core functionality)

## Expected Benefits
- Improved code quality
- Better performance
- Enhanced security
- Reduced technical debt
- Other: [please specify]

## Tasks Checklist
- [ ] Task 1
- [ ] Task 2
- [ ] Task 3

## Additional Context
Add any other context, links, or references about the maintenance task here.

## Priority
- [ ] Urgent (security or critical maintenance)
- [ ] Normal (regular maintenance)
- [ ] Low (nice to have, can be deferred)
